suncertify.db
Interface Data.RecordsLockHandler

Enclosing class:
Data
public static interface Data.RecordsLockHandler

Defines the strategy for records locking behavior to be used by an instance of Data.

See Also:
Data

Method Summary
 boolean isLocked(int recNo)
          Checks if record recNo generally locked.
 boolean isLockedByCaller(int recNo)
          Checks if record is locked by calling client.
 void lock(int recNo)
          Lock record with number recNo.
 void unlock(int recNo)
          Unlock record with number recNo and notify other waiting threads a record has been unlocked.
 

Method Detail

lock

void lock(int recNo)
          throws RecordNotFoundException,
                 java.io.IOException
Lock record with number recNo.

Parameters:
recNo - record number to be locked.
Throws:
RecordNotFoundException - if record is not found in database file or deleted.
java.io.IOException - if reading for record stream is failed.

isLocked

boolean isLocked(int recNo)
                 throws RecordNotFoundException,
                        java.io.IOException
Checks if record recNo generally locked.

Parameters:
recNo - record number to check if it is locked or not.
Returns:
true if record with number recNo is locked, otherwise false.
Throws:
RecordNotFoundException - if record does not exist in database file or deleted.
java.io.IOException - if reading for records bytes is failed.

isLockedByCaller

boolean isLockedByCaller(int recNo)
                         throws RecordNotFoundException,
                                java.io.IOException
Checks if record is locked by calling client.

Parameters:
recNo - record number to check if is locked by caller or not.
Returns:
true if record with number recNo is locked by calling thread, otherwise false.
Throws:
RecordNotFoundException - if record does not exist in database file or deleted.
java.io.IOException - if reading from records bytes is failed.

unlock

void unlock(int recNo)
            throws RecordNotFoundException,
                   java.io.IOException
Unlock record with number recNo and notify other waiting threads a record has been unlocked.

Parameters:
recNo - record number to be unlocked.
Throws:
RecordNotFoundException - if record does not exist or deleted.
java.io.IOException - if reading for records bytes is failed.
